SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into t_resource (name, size, path, type, ext_name, ref_biz_type, ref_biz_id, create_time, modify_time, memo) values (#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{size,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{path,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{extName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{refBizType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{refBizId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{createTime,jdbcType=DATE}, #{modifyTime,jdbcType=DATE}, #{memo,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update t_resource set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, size = #{size,jdbcType=BIGINT}, path = #{path,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, type = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ext_name = #{extName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ref_biz_type = #{refBizType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ref_biz_id = #{refBizId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=DATE}, modify_time = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=DATE}, memo = #{memo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, name, size, path, type, ext_name, ref_biz_type, ref_biz_id, create_time, modify_time, memo from t_resource where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
select id, name, size, path, type, ext_name, ref_biz_type, ref_biz_id, create_time, modify_time, memo from t_resource
